hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(auth|payment|security|\.env|credentials)'; then echo '[WARN] Modifying critical system file. Ensure user approval per CLAUDE.md Tier 1 rules.' && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(rm -rf|git push --force|DROP TABLE|DELETE FROM)'; then echo '[BLOCKED] Dangerous command detected' && exit 2; fi
echo '[CLAUDE] Before planning: 1) RETRIEVE MEMORY (project context, preferences, patterns) 2) Read CLAUDE.md → PROJECT.md → docs/README.md. See POLICIES/memory.md for retrieval protocol.'
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'docs/'; then echo '[CLAUDE] Documentation modified. Remember: update Last Updated date, index new docs in docs/README.md.'; fi
echo '[CLAUDE] Session started. FIRST: Retrieve memory context (search_nodes for project, preferences, patterns). THEN: Read CLAUDE.md | PROJECT.md | docs/README.md | docs/TODO.md'
echo '[CLAUDE] Task complete. Remember: 1) Update memory with learnings (decisions, patterns, preferences) 2) Log results in plan file 3) Update TODO.md if needed.'
echo '[CLAUDE] Context compacting. Key context: Memory state, current plan file, TODO.md state, recent decisions.'
echo '[CLAUDE] Session ending. Ensure: 1) Memory updated with session learnings 2) Plan files updated 3) TODO.md current 4) No uncommitted critical changes.'
